thread.title: Italy, Belgium seal Euro 2016 spots
thread.title_full: Italy, Belgium seal Euro 2016 spots - Sports

author: PA Sport
title: Italy, Belgium seal Euro 2016 spots
text:
Baku: Italy and Belgium claimed places at Euro 2016 on Saturday with the former progressing from Group H with a match to spare by beating Azerbaijan 3-1 in Baku.


Italy's players celebrate after scoring a goal during the Euro 2016 group H qualifying football match between Azerbaijan and Italy on October 10, 2015, in Baku. Pic/AFP 
Eder opened the scoring for Antonio Conte's men and although Dmitri Nazarov's equaliser gave Italy a fright, goals from Stephan El Shaarawy and Matteo Darmian made sure of the win.
The Belgians climbed to the top of Group B following a comprehensive 4-1 rout of Andorra. Radja Nainggolan, Kevin De Bruyne, Eden Hazard (penalty) and Laurent Depoitre found the target for the visitors, with Andorra's only reply coming from an Ildefons Lima spot-kick.

Kazakhstan 1-2 Holland
Norway 2-0 Malta
